description: This tender is for the purchase of various types of switches for the Department of National Defence. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. Tenders must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
### Tender Notice: Switches
#### REFERENCE NUMBER: PW-23-01020134

**Notice Published By:** [Department of National Defence](#Department of National Defence)
**Publication Date:** January 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 30, 2023, 14:00:00

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the procurement of the following items:

* Item 1: Switch, push, NSN 00-4362115, quantity: 3, Unit of Issue: each, delivery to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
* Item 2: Switch, push, NSN 00-4362115, quantity: 2, Unit of Issue: each, delivery to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
* Item 3: Lever, switch, NSN 01-2217861, quantity: 8, Unit of Issue: each, delivery to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
* Item 4: Lever, switch, NSN 01-2217861, quantity: 8, Unit of Issue: each, delivery to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
* Item 5: Switch, push, NSN 01-2761827, quantity: 6, Unit of Issue: each, delivery to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
* Item 6: Switch, push, NSN 01-2761827, quantity: 3, Unit of Issue: each, delivery to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
* Item 7: Switch, rotary, NSN 01-3466211, quantity: 12, Unit of Issue: each, delivery to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
* Item 8: Switch, rotary, NSN 01-3466211, quantity: 4, Unit of Issue: each, delivery to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

**Delivery Locations:**

* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Product Requirements:**

* Bidders must provide equivalent or substitute products with the brand name, model, and/or Part Number and NCAGE.
* Preference will be given to Canadian goods and/or services.
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

**Concerned Agencies:**

* Department of National Defence

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Katerina Drescher
